thread.title: Tourist is sent flying through the air by elephant
thread.title_full: Tourist is sent flying through the air by elephant

title: Tourist is sent flying through the air by elephant
text: comments Elephants are generally considered to be gentle creatures. But one woman found out what can happen if you anger them - after being sent flying several feet into the air. Footage shows the woman washing the elephant with a sponge while in a river in Thailand. A woman who was washing an elephant's trunk in Thailand managed to accidentally annoy him Clearly unhappy at being touched, he reacts by throwing her into the air with his trunk She is seen splashing water at his trunk before continuing to sponge him down. But clearly unhappy at being touched, he reacts by throwing her into the air with his trunk. RELATED ARTICLES
